ourTeam.body: We are Hydro, a global leader in aluminum and energy solutions, dedicated to creating sustainable and innovative products that support a greener future. Our company covers the entire value chain, from raw material extraction to processing and distribution, serving thousands of customers across various markets and segments. We believe in the power of collaboration and innovation, and our employees are our most important resource. Through close cooperation and sharing of experiences, we constantly strive to develop smarter solutions that meet our customers' needs. Our commitment to sustainability permeates our activities, ensuring that we not only achieve our business goals but also contribute positively to society and the environment. We are Hydro, and we are shaping the future of aluminum together.
